original_text: So Moses stretched out his staff over Egypt, and the Lord made an east wind blow across the land all that day and all that night. By morning the wind had brought the locusts;
korean_text: 모세가 애굽 땅 위에 그 지팡이를 들매 여호와께서 동풍을 일으켜 온 낮과 온 밤에 불게 하시니 아침이 되매 동풍이 메뚜기를 불어 들인지라

sentences.original_text: So Moses stretched out his staff over Egypt
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 모세가 그의 지팡이를 이집트 위로 뻗었다

sentences.original_text: and the Lord made an east wind blow
across the land all that day
By morning the wind had brought the locusts
